alert.note: Alert for Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 10 at 5:34AM EDT until July 12 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River At Gaylordsville. * WHEN...Until late Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 9.5 feet, The water reaches businesses on the low side of Spring Street. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:00 AM EDT Monday the stage was 7.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning to a crest of 9.7 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Gaylordsville Flood Stage: 8.0 Observed Stage at Mon 5 am: 7.3 Forecast: Mon 8 am 7.9 Mon 2 pm 9.3 Mon 8 pm 9.7 Tue 2 am 9.2 Tue 8 am 9.0 Tue 2 pm 8.8 Tue 8 pm 8.7 Wed 2 am 8.5 Wed 8 am 8.3 Wed 2 pm 8.1 Wed 8 pm 7.9 Thu 2 am 7.6 &&
